reou.client
Class Client

java.lang.Object
  reou.Instance
      reou.client.Client

public class Client
extends Instance

An instance for game for client-side operations. The client will receive and send messages to a server. Operations that require user input will be dispatched using Requests.

Author:
Kristopher Ives

Constructor Summary
Client(int localPort)
          Initializes a game instance as a client on a specific port.
